name: From The Sea
description:
A basic FPS controller and assets for movement and simple UI/menus.

The objective for this Sprint is for the player to get to the end of each level, currently that is getting to a building with and exit sign.

NOTE: this is not a finished game and is very, very basic this has been published for advice and feedback

If you want to give feedback there is a form here: https://forms.gle/Gmo2PS9D4V1AJkn16
